case.title: Mature man for wining and dining - 29 (Belgravia)
case.text:
Please be nice, kind, confident, old-fashioned, charming,single, Â easy going and live in London.
I am told I am beautiful, fit, smart, educated, fashionable, with a lovely personality.
No time wasters please. Minimum age: 39 please.... An email with a few details will receive a reply.
